short_summary: Local Access Service (Nova Scotia and Prince Edward Island - Core) Shared Services Canada
description: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the Local Access Service (Nova Scotia and Prince Edward Island - Core)Shared Services Canada (SSC)What is an ACAN: An ACAN is a public notice indicating to the supplier community that a department or agency intends to award a contract for goods, services or construction to a pre-identified supplier, thereby allowing other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding, by submitting a statement of capabilities. If no supplier submits a statement of capabilities that meets the requirements set out in the ACAN, on or before the closing date stated for in the ACAN, the contracting officer may then proceed with the award of a contract.
